data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martins, André Luis (2015): A new species of Deinodryinus Perkins, 1907 (Hymenoptera, Dryinidae) from Minas Gerais, Brazil. Zootaxa 4032 (2): 236-240, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4032.2.11
